resources.string: " Introduction to OOPs Classes & Objects Constructor & Destructor Encapsulation, Polymorphism Abstraction, Inheritance Overloading & Overriding this , super, static keywords Final, finally & finalize "

To use voice typing or voice commands, your computer microphone needs to be on and working. Devices and microphones vary, so check your computer manual for instructions. Microphone settings are typically in the System Preferences
